summary: BuildRequest specified no requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff shows substantial implementation work across backend and frontend (goal planning data model, access control, profile/goal APIs, and UI components for planning and auto-planning).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend implementation of goal planning domain model and user data structures (goals, milestones, tasks, daily check-ins, weekly reviews/plans) with persistence maps and goal ID generation.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, yet significant new backend functionality appears to be implemented/modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Authorization/access-control enforcement for profile and goal operations (permission checks, admin checks, traps on unauthorized).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest has no requirements), but diff shows access control integration and permission checks.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend AutoPlanner goal picker UI with goal templates, simulated generation delay, and plan generation logic wired to a callback.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; new/modified UI and plan generation behavior is shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend multi-step Planning Phase flow (milestones → weekly tasks → daily tasks → review) including mutations/queries and lock-in behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; diff shows a full planning workflow implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state updated/contains a pending fix request about 'Generate Plan' button styling inconsistency.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements; additionally, this appears as a separate tracked request in project_state rather than a stated BuildRequest requirement.
